text: The ABC reality star made his first appearance on the franchise since leaving'Paradise'in scandal this summer. DeMario Jackson made his awaited TV return on Tuesday's Bachelor in Paradise. ` ` I'm in a much better place in my life,'' Jackson told host Chris Harrison, comparing his current status to one month prior when he was embroiled in the ABC reality show's controversy. ` ` June 11 was very difficult for myself, my family, my friends, my mother.'' Jackson, speaking to Harrison during a pre - taped studio special, said he immediately bonded with castmate Corinne Olympios over their ` ` villain'' personas from past stints on the franchise when they landed on the set of Paradise earlier this summer.
